item.description:
@Barrow_Reborn wrote:

how do i change the color of the logot message:

            sendQuest("To Leave TestScape safely", 2450);
            sendQuest("click the logout button below", 2451);
            sendQuest("Thanks for playing.", 2452);

well does anyone know!
